text:
SALEM

Srimadh Thyagaraja Venkataramana Bhagavath Swamigal Mahotsava Sabha: Annual Aradhana festival, Salem Jayashree Bala, Sourashtra Kalyana mandapam, 6 p.m.; flute concert by Prapanjam Mukyaprana, 7.30 p.m.

Government Museum: Visit of mobile museum, Fort Government Girls HSS, CSI School and Little Flower HSS, 10 a.m. and 2 p.m.

Sona College of Technology: Department of Civil Engineering, Project Expo 2016, 10 a.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Thangam Pattu Maaligai showroom, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

New Century Book House Limited: Book exhibition, Bose maidan, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Salem Jamathul Ulama Sabai and Noorul Islam Jamath: Special bayan for women, Ammapalayam Women Maqtab Madrasa, 11.15 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

Paavai Arts and Science College for Women: NSS special camp, Government School, Kozhingipatti, 11 a.m.

PGP College of Engineering and Technology: Department of Management Studies, workshop on ‘communication skill development’, S. R. M. Sokkalingam of Versatile Corporate Solutions, Chennai, resource person, 10 a.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Cooptex showroom, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

Sengunthar Engineering College: Department of Science and Humanities, National Science Day, P. Venuvanalingam, Emeritus Scientist, School of Chemistry, Bharathidasan University, Tiruchi, chief guest, T. S. Natarajan, Chairman, presides, 2.30 p.m.

ERODE

Velalar College of Engineering and Technology: Talk on Entrepreneurship by S.M. Rasumani, General Manager, District Industries Centre, Erode, 11.00 a.m.

EBET Group of Institutions: Introduction to Japanese language, 3.15 p.m.
title: engagements
